subject: [Q] How to enable java 1.4 assertions?
msgSnippet: When I run my JUnit tests I would like to enable the java language (1.4) assertions (in addition to the JUnit assertions).  I invoke my JUnit tests from ant.
messageBody:
When I run my JUnit tests I would like to enable the java language (1.4)
assertions (in addition to the JUnit assertions). I invoke my JUnit tests
from ant.

Now, to enable the java language assertions requires that certain flags
(-ea) be passed to the java command. However, in my tests, JUnit invokes
the java command. So, how to I tell JUnit to pass the -ea (or other flags)
to the java command?

Thanks, in advance.

Cheers,

Michael
